mapper.insert: insert into ldm_eqp_conn (seq_id, eqp_mac, eqp_sn, net_status, update_time, operation_time, eqp_mes) values (#{seqId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eqpMac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eqpSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{netStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operationTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eqpMes,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ldm_eqp_conn set eqp_mac = #{eqpMac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eqp_sn = #{eqpSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, net_status = #{netStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operation_time = #{operationTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, eqp_mes = #{eqpMes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where seq_id = #{seqId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select seq_id, eqp_mac, eqp_sn, net_status, update_time, operation_time, eqp_mes from ldm_eqp_conn
mapper.delete: delete from ldm_eqp_conn where seq_id IN #{item}
mapper.insert: insert into ldm_eqp_conn (seq_id, eqp_mac, eqp_sn, net_status, update_time, operation_time, eqp_mes) values (#{seqId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eqpMac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eqpSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{netStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operationTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eqpMes,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:

eqp_mac = #{eqpMac,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eqp_sn = #{eqpSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
net_status = #{netStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where seq_id = #{seqId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
